p.sub: Answering these questions while actively reading the text is good practice for answering the kinds of questions that might appear on the exams. Your answers may also shape the discussions in class.

open_response.prompt: Question: Examine the illustration of the end of the chromosome with the different length strands resulting from the replication. If the rules for DNA polymerase directed synthesis are observed, to which strand would DNA polymerase want to add dNTPs? What would it need to satisfy the substrate requirement for DNA polymerase to conduct the synthesis?
